name: Create new Airtable records for every response from Typeform events
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically transferring responses from Typeform to Airtable. With this template, every time a new event is submitted in Typeform, Make will create a corresponding record in Airtable, ensuring that your data is organized and easily accessible for analysis and follow-up. This integration eliminates manual data entry, saving you time and reducing the risk of errors. Perfect for managing event registrations, feedback, or any other response-driven data collection!
